member.name: T:Sudoku.ComponentModel.CandidatePosition
member.summary: Represents a candidate position.
member.param: The internal absolute position index of the candidate.

remarks.para: By design of candidate drawing system, we will split a cell into a square subgrid of size n by n, where n is equal to value of property .
Then, we define an absolute internal index to describe a cell will be drawn, which is in range [0, n * n) - property .

member.name: M:Sudoku.ComponentModel.CandidatePosition.#ctor(Sudoku.ComponentModel.Absolute,Sudoku.ComponentModel.Relative,Sudoku.ComponentModel.Absolute)
member.summary: Represents a candidate position.
member.param: The internal absolute position index of the candidate.

remarks.para: By design of candidate drawing system, we will split a cell into a square subgrid of size n by n, where n is equal to value of property .
Then, we define an absolute internal index to describe a cell will be drawn, which is in range [0, n * n) - property .

summary.para: Represents a grid template type that draws block (thick) and normal (thin) lines onto a canvas via the specified configuration.
Because it can define the shape of a grid, the template will also be used as identifiers of puzzles, as basic grid panel.

member.summary: Indicates point mapper instance that can project points into cells.
member.remarks: This is a member, which means you must initialize while a template instance is being initialized. However, this member is also modified , which means you can override this member. Through overridding this property, you can add extra logic to handle complex assignments around of this property.

member.name: T:Sudoku.ComponentModel.Item
member.summary: Represents an item to be drawn. The item can be anything the canvas can draw - cell background, canvas background, candidate highlight, grid lines, and other basic items to draw.

member.summary: Indicates the type of item.

member.name: P:Sudoku.ComponentModel.Item.EqualityContract
member.summary: Gets the equality contract for this instance.

remarks.para: The equality contract represents the runtime type identity used when evaluating value-based equality. It allows derived types to participate in equality comparisons while preserving type consistency across an inheritance hierarchy.
By default, this property returns the concrete runtime type of the current instance. Derived types may override this property to customize how type identity is considered during equality comparisons.
This mechanism enables polymorphic equality semantics without relying directly on .

member.summary: Indicates the default instance.

member.summary: Indicates font name of text that will be drawn with big size, like given and modifiable digits. By default it's "Arial".

member.summary: Indicates font name of text that will be drawn with small size, like candidates. By default it's derived from property .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BigTextFontWeight
member.summary: Indicates font weight of text that will be drawn with big size, like given and modifiable digits. By default it's .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.SmallTextFontWeight
member.summary: Indicates font weight of text that will be drawn with small size, like candidates. By default it's derived from property .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BigTextFontWidth
member.summary: Indicates font width of text that will be drawn with big size, like given and modifiable digits. By default it's .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.SmallTextFontWidth
member.summary: Indicates font width of text that will be drawn with small size, like candidates. By default it's derived from property .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BigTextFontSlant
member.summary: Indicates font slant of text that will be drawn with big size, like given and modifiable digits. By default it's .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.SmallTextFontSlant
member.summary: Indicates font slant of text that will be drawn with small size, like candidates. By default it's derived from property .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BigTextFontSizeScale
member.summary: Indicates font size of text that will be drawn in with big size, like given and modifiable digits. The scale value is related to a cell size. By default it's 0.75.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.SmallTextFontSizeScale
member.summary: Indicates font size of text that will be drawn in with small size, like candidates. By default it's derived from property .

remarks.para: The scale value is related to a cell size; however, different-sized grids may produce different-ranged candidate values.

Drawing API may use square root of size to split a cell into multiple subcells, in order to show them. For example, if a grid is 9 * 9 (of 81 cells), candidate values should be between 1 and 9 (both sides included), we can divide a cell into 3 * 3 subcells, in order to show all 9 digits. However, if a grid is 13 * 13 (of 169 cells), candidate values should be between 1 and 13, we should divide a cell into 4 * 4 subcells, in order to show all 13 digits.

But, 3 (for 9 * 9 grids) or 4 (for 13 * 13 grids) can only be calculated from instances, using properties and . Because we don't store any information on grid sizes here, we cannot know how to split the grid. Therefore, this property value is relative to cell itself.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.GridBorderRoundedRectangleCornerRadius
member.summary: Indicates corner radius ratio of rounded rectangle of border lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.12.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThinLineWidth
member.summary: Indicates stroke thickness ratio of thin lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.0225.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThickLineWidth
member.summary: Indicates stroke thickness ratio of thick lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.09.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Represents background color. By default it's equivalent value of color .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThinLineColor
member.summary: Represents thin line color. By default it's equivalent value of color .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThickLineColor
member.summary: Represents thick line color. By default it's same value inherited from property .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.TemplateIntersectionColor
member.summary: Represents template intersection color. By default it's initialized as (223, 234, 255, 255) (light deepblue).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.TextColorSet
member.summary: Represents text color set. The default color set contains 5 different colors.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.JSudokuColorSet
member.summary: Represents JSudoku color set. The default color set contains 28 different colors.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Serialization.Inherited`1.Resolve``1(``0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resolve the value using the owner instance. The resolver should map a reference string to another (or if not found). Will follow reference chain up to and will throw on cycles or missing.
member.param: The max depth. By default it's 2.
member.exception:
Throws when at least one invalid case is encountered:
Maximum resolution depth exceeded (May cause a cycle)
Cycle detected when resolving a certain reference
Reference is not found by resolver.
